author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Violence from the Left is often dismissed, with calls to “tone down” rhetoric. At the same time, a YouGov poll may shed light on why some on the Left are seemingly celebrating Charlie Kirk’s death. Today’s show breaks this down.

“I have been telling you since at least 2019 that ANTIFA and BLM need to be designated as terrorist organizations," Crowder said. "You can’t find a single national figure in the Democratic Party in this country over the last ten years who, at least, didn’t on three separate occasions either condone or directly enable violence. This is the culmination of decades of work.
title: "Your anger is justified": Crowder won't be "toning down" his rhetoric, and neither should you.

author: Brodigan
description:

author: Brodigan
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

The unemployment rate next month is going to skyrocket with the number of people getting fired for celebrating Charlie Kirk's assassination. No, not "criticizing" him as reported by the fake news. Celebrating him being blown away for his kids to see. Yet, the worst story we've heard comes from Canada and, God willing, a soon-to-be FORMER 5th-grade teacher.

It's Canada, so you never know.

There's been chirping online that conservatives are pro-cancel culture now. Meh. The left created the new rules that you can get fired for donating to the wrong person, tweeting something unfortunate when you were in high school, or liking the wrong
title: Teacher suspended after "allegedly" showing video of Charlie Kirk's assassination to 5th graders and celebrating his death
